griffin.name: Griffin
griffin.bestiary_entry: Aye, half-eagle, half tomcat, just like on the lord's crest. 'Cept this 'un was carryin' me dead cow 'stead of a scepter. - Griffin attack witness, name unknown

drowner.name: Drowner
drowner.bestiary_entry: When at the water's edge, you gotta be quiet. First of all, so as not to scare the fish. Second - so you don't attract drowners.

siren.name: Siren
siren.bestiary_entry: Out at sea, if you hear a beautiful woman singing, turn the ship around at once. You understand? Even if it means sailing straight back into a storm.

devil-by-the-well.name: Devil by the well
devil-by-the-well.bestiary_entry: Despite what is commonly thought, peasants do not interrupt their labors at midday to get out of the sun - they do it to avoid noonwraiths.

noonwraith.name: Noonwraith
noonwraith.bestiary_entry: A specter born of tragic events — appears at midday to torment the living. Stay in the shade if you value your life.

leshen.name: Leshen
leshen.bestiary_entry: An ancient forest guardian turned hostile. Leshens command roots and animals to do their bidding — they are cunning and territorial.

wyvern.name: Wyvern
wyvern.bestiary_entry: Smaller than dragons but far from harmless — wyverns are fast, aggressive, and often nest on cliffs above human settlements.

nekker.name: Nekker
nekker.bestiary_entry: Small, vicious, and dangerous in packs. Nekkering swarms can overwhelm lone travelers with their numbers and speed.

foglet.name: Foglet
foglet.bestiary_entry: They appear from the mist, strike, and vanish. If you see fog in bright daylight — run, for it's no natural mist.

ghoul.name: Ghoul
ghoul.bestiary_entry: Corpse eaters that gather in battlefields and graveyards. Ghouls can heal themselves by consuming flesh mid-fight.

werewolf.name: Werewolf
werewolf.bestiary_entry: Cursed men who turn into beasts under the full moon. Werewolves heal rapidly and grow stronger as they bleed.

ice_elemental.name: Ice Elemental
ice_elemental.bestiary_entry: Forged from eternal frost by powerful mages. They are slow but hit like falling glaciers and resist most damage.

fiend.name: Fiend
fiend.bestiary_entry: Massive, horned beasts that shake the ground with every step. Their third eye can hypnotize prey before tearing it apart.

water_hag.name: Water Hag
water_hag.bestiary_entry: Ugly, hateful creatures that dwell near swamps and rivers. They fling mud to blind their prey before dragging them under.

harpy.name: Harpy
harpy.bestiary_entry: Shrieking monsters that attack from above. Harpies strike quickly and retreat, making them hard to pin down.

earth_elemental.name: Earth Elemental
earth_elemental.bestiary_entry: Created to guard ancient ruins. Earth elementals crush their foes with unstoppable force and shrug off most attacks.
